ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user

Class InitializeUserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.user.InitializeUserController

  • public class InitializeUserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the InitializeUser Activity. Responsible for validating input of the view's form. Will be used to create a fresh user locally and on ElasticSearch.

      • isUserNameTaken

        public boolean isUserNameTaken(java.lang.String username)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Check's both elasticSearch and the local cache to determine if username is taken.
        Parameters:
        username - username that we want to know if has been taken
        Returns:
        true == taken, false == not taken
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isEmailInValid

        public boolean isEmailInValid(java.lang.String email)
        Check to see if an email matches the valid syntax.
        Parameters:
        email - email that will be validated
        Returns:
        true == valid, false == invalid

      • initializeUser

        public void initializeUser(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String city,
                  java.lang.String email,
                  java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Setup user, profile, inventory, and friendslist entities locally and on ElasticSearch.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the new user
        city - city to be entered in user profile
        email - email to be entered in the user profile
        phoneNumber - phone number to be entered in user profile (can be empty)
